title: Greggry
author: Greggry
content: Women hands are very romantic and cooling to men body system! And men hands, chest and back are rest pillows for ladies. comments.author: bitterguy28
comments.body: if you are in love? and almost find the perfect girl? then nothing to worry because it is normal , but the bad thing is that if you are addicted to different women each time so this is alarming .

comments.author: digaran
comments.body: Well lucky you guys, at least you can feel the touch of a woman, I on the other hand, I'm just used to watching them through the glass, so there is no touching.! SIGH. ðŸ˜‚ I'm an Onlyfan of love sex and romance!

comments.author: mich
comments.body: Well it is not a good thing for you to have a addiction. It doesnt make a difference if the addiction is to a drug substance, something like being a thief, or something like sexual activities. Having sex is a good thing. It can lower your blood pressure and give you better heart health. It will also build your self esteem and build confidence. I think sex is really necessary for a man and woman. But not if you are doing it too much. If it is a addiction taking over your life you need to seek help from professionals.
